EmailTemplate.name: Re-enrolment Issue - Confirmation of re-enrolment
EmailTemplate.subject: Re-enrolment Issue - Confirmation of re-enrolment - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email.
Due to a systems error, a number of students were sent email advice stating they have not yet re-enrolled. We are currently investigating this matter to find out what the issues are and hope to resolve it as soon as possible
I wish to confirm with you that you are re-enrolled for 2017, and apologies for any inconvenience caused.
Should you have any concerns or require further assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
